      • getBlogPostPageResult

        public com.jalios.jcms.db.PageResult getBlogPostPageResult​(java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                           boolean isDescending,
                                                           int firstResult,
                                                           int maxResults,
                                                           com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                                           com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace workspace)
        Returns a PageResult of BlogPost for all blogs
        Parameters:
        orderBy - the orderBy criteria (e.g. "lastPostDate", "title", ...)
        isDescending - if true perform a descending sort.
        firstResult - set the first post to retrieve. If <= 0, rows will be retrieved beginnning from first blog post.
        maxResults - set the maximum number of posts to retrieve. If < 0, there is no limit to the number of posts retrieved.
        mbr - the logged member
        workspace - workspace to restrict. Can be null.
        Returns:
        a PageResult of BlogPost for all blogs

      • canSeeDraftPosts

        public boolean canSeeDraftPosts​(AbstractBlog blog,
                                com.jalios.jcms.Member loggedMember)
        Checks if given member can see posts in draft state in given blog.

        Draft workflow must be enabled in given Blog's workspace.

        Member must be Blog's admin or author.

        There must be at least one visible post in draft.

        Parameters:
        blog - the blog
        loggedMember - the member
        Returns:
        true if member can see posts in draft state in given blog.
        Since:
        blog-9.1
